title: Moving Forward
description: This is a collection of personal stories. Love, loss, hard work and happiness. I was molested growing up and it took me 20 years to speak up. I lost my family because of it but I created my own family in the process. This book is stories from my journey. This is a compilation of 4 of my Work, love, pain and children. I hope you enjoy.
author: J. Acosta
